ai-patthana8.52:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.52:1.1_0: does not give rise to the defilements with corruptions without the defilements.
ai-patthana8.52:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the corruptions without defilements. The three things do not give rise to defilements. ...
ai-patthana8.52:3.1_0: does not give rise to the defilements with the defilements, and those without the defilements.
ai-patthana8.52:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.52:4.1_0: ... the result in all five ways ... surmounting ...”
